data.title: True stories that make you face yourself and think.
data.meta_description: True stories that make you face yourself and think.
data.text:
Thank you for UNSHACKLED! I listen on ABC Radio 99.3 every afternoon on my way from work. I am not yet a Christian, but those testimonies haunt me every now and then. Thank you so much.

- Uganda

Thank you for your radio program Unshackled! I’ve been listening to it for years and always look forward to each story when it comes on. Regardless of the generation and people in the stories, it lets me know that God truly does work in people’s lives.

- Silver City, NC

I started listening to UNSHACKLED! a few weeks ago and it encourages me to pray.

- Clarksville, TN

It is always exciting to hear the UNSHACKLED! program. A man of whom one of your programs was about led me to the Lord Jesus in 1974. I am very thankful for the people involved in this ministry. I am thankful to GOD for continuing to keep this ministry thriving. God Bless All of You!

- Casper, WY

I’ve been tuning to radio station WJOU each Friday evening, your ministry is so profound and unshackling. My prayers are with your Christian team.

- Cave Springs, AR.

I listen to Unshackled! whenever I can; I’m only 13 and have been listening for 4 years. Your drams have helped me through some hard times and have encouraged me to memorize some Bible verses.

- Unknown

Great programs! Been listening to them for over 20 years.

- Unknown

I love to listen to UNSHACKLED! and appreciate your work in the Lords might.

- Unknown

I have listened to UNSHACKLED! for decades and I appreciate that you have stayed true to “the Word of God’. Jehovah bless and guide you in Christ Jesus.

- Unknown

I am 13 years old and I love UNSHACKLED! it's a real blessing. It helps me in my spiritual walk with God. I want you to know I also appreciate the website.

- Unknown
